name: Tm90RnVu
description:
A game I made over the summer.

You play as a blob with a grappling hook, the goal is to get the goal at the end of each level. Don't question it, it doesn't have to make sense.

I was inspired by the frustration, and yet enjoyment, of Getting Over It.

Any constructive criticism is greatly appreciated  :)

controls:

esc - exit level

right click - select level

left click - grapple
